subject: leave letter
body:
Subject: Request for Temporary Leave Due to High Workload

Dear Dhanush,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm writing to inform you that I find myself facing an unusually high workload over the next few days, and I anticipate that I may need to take some time off to ensure that all tasks are completed to the best of my ability.

I understand the importance of my role and the impact my absence may have on our team and projects. Therefore, I would like to request your permission to take a few days off to manage my workload effectively. The specific dates I have in mind are [insert dates here].

I have already discussed this situation with my team and we are trying to redistribute the work as much as possible to minimize disruption. However, I believe that my presence to complete certain tasks will be crucial.

I appreciate your understanding and support in this matter. If there are any concerns or adjustments that need to be made, please do not hesitate to let me know. I am more than willing to work flexible hours before or after my leave to accommodate any urgent needs.

Thank you for considering my request, and I look forward to your response.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Contact Information]
